body_html: That's right...what determines the type + device of a tensor returned from a factory function with defaults is the default tensor type + the current device (if the default tensor type is cuda). This just changes the scalar type of the default tensor type.
body_text: That's right...what determines the type + device of a tensor returned from a factory function with defaults is the default tensor type + the current device (if the default tensor type is cuda).  This just changes the scalar type of the default tensor type.
body: That's right...what determines the type + device of a tensor returned from a factory function with defaults is the default tensor type + the current device (if the default tensor type is cuda).  This just changes the scalar type of the default tensor type.
